verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord, You have been good. You have been faithful To all generations. O Lord, Your steadfast love and tender mercies Have been our salvation.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For by Your hand we have been fed And by Your Spirit we have been led.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord, Almighty God Father unchanging, upright and Holy. O Lord, You have been good You have been faithful, You have been good.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For by Your hand we have been fed And by Your Spirit we have been led.{/lang-eng}
